Avlon AffirmCare - MoistureRight Hair Repair Masque

Brand: Avlon

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Acacia Concinna Fruit Powder, Royal Jelly, Keratin, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Limonene, Hexyl Cinammal, Disodium Ethylene Dicocamide PEG-15 Disulfate, Citric Acid, Isopropyl Alcohol, Sodium Benzoate.

Ingredient

nzoate.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
